attributes.action: Suspend all council tax during the Covid-19 pandemic
attributes.background:
The Government has pledged billons of pounds to help companies though this unprecedented crisis, relaxing business rates and tax payments.
 What about the people?
 We need support to, many of us may lose are job. You say your the people's government. So give the people the same financial  support.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
